Detailed Description

Creates a typical DAZ Studio dialog.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzOptionsDialog::DzOptionsDialog ( QWidget *  parent,
const QString &  name 
)

Default Constructor. Creates a typical DAZ Studio dialog with 'What's This', 'Apply', 'Accept', and 'Cancel' buttons. By default, the 'Apply' button is hidden, call enableApplyButton() to make it visible.

Parameters:
parent The parent widget for the dialog. Typically this should be the main window, or the currently active modal dialog.
name The object name for the widget.
DzOptionsDialog::~DzOptionsDialog (  )  [virtual]

Destructor

int  stretch = 0 
) [virtual]

Adds a layout into the main vertical layout of the dialog.

Parameters:
child The layout to add as a child of the dialog's main layout.
stretch The amount of stretch for the child layout.

Reimplemented from DzBasicDialog.
